Directory: obj/pnt/

Contents

.pro files

_pnt_resize.pro

Resizes a POINT structure.

ominas_point__define.pro

Structure for managing points.

pnt_apply_condition.pro

Selects point in POINT structures based on a given condition structure.

pnt_assign.pro

Replaces fields in a POINT object.

pnt_assoc_xd.pro

Returns the associated descriptor for a CORE object.

pnt_compress.pro

Compresses many POINT objects into one.

pnt_condition.pro

Returns predefined condition structures for various common situations.

pnt_create_descriptors.pro

Creates and initializes a POINT object.

pnt_cull.pro

Cleans out an array of POINT objects by removing POINT objects that are empty, or whose points all fail the specified conditions.

pnt_data.pro

Returns the point-by-point data associated with a POINT object.

pnt_desc.pro

Returns the description associated with a POINT object.

pnt_explode.pro

Explodes a POINT object into single-point objects.

pnt_flags.pro

Returns the flags associated with a POINT object.

pnt_input.pro

Returns the input description associated with a POINT object.

pnt_nt.pro

Returns the nt dimension of a POINT object.

pnt_nv.pro

Returns the nv dimension of a POINT object.

pnt_offset.pro

Offsets points in a POINT object.

pnt_points.pro

Returns the points associated with a POINT object.

pnt_query.pro

Returns the fields associated with a POINT object.

pnt_read.pro

Reads a POINT file.

pnt_scale.pro

Scales points in a POINT object.

pnt_set_assoc_xd.pro

Replaces the assoc_xd field in a CORE object.

pnt_set_data.pro

Replaces the point-by-point data in a POINT object.

pnt_set_desc.pro

Replaces the description field in a POINT object.

pnt_set_flags.pro

Replaces the flags in a POINT object.

pnt_set_input.pro

Replaces the input description field in a POINT object.

pnt_set_points.pro

Replaces the points in a POINT object.

pnt_set_tags.pro

Replaces the tags in a POINT object.

pnt_set_vectors.pro

Replaces the vectors in a POINT object.

pnt_tags.pro

Returns the tags associated with a POINT object.

pnt_template.pro

Creates a new POINT using an existing one as a template.

pnt_test.pro

Assesses the validity of a single POINT object.

pnt_threshold.pro

Flags points whose given indicator falls below or above a given threshold.

pnt_uncompress.pro

Explodes a compressed POINT object back into an array of POINT objects using the original POINT objects as a template.

pnt_valid.pro

Assesses the validity of POINT objects.

pnt_vectors.pro

Returns the vectors associated with a POINT object.

pnt_write.pro

Writes a POINT object to a file.
